name: Investor Table — Column Management + Custom Groups
description: Two features for the Investors table: (1) Manage Columns modal matching the Contacts pattern — two-panel drag-to-reorder with hidden/visible columns, (2) Custom investor groups — user-created lists that appear as tabs alongside the lifecycle segments, with create/rename/delete flows. Interactive prototype with working column toggle, group creation, and table re-rendering.
prompt: /prototype "Investor table column management and custom groups"

versions.notes: Full interactive prototype: column management modal with drag handles and +/x buttons, custom groups as tabs with create group inline flow, group management dropdown, and responsive table that reflects column changes.
